title: how many days of break is there after finishing a semester in MCA
content: hi I wanted to join MCA in pes university (ring road campus) . I wanted to know if there are any break between each semester of MCA.

comments.body: Nope. There is no break. Profs teach all year around, 365 days a year. This allows you to cover double the number of semesters as other colleges. IIT Bangalore for a reason /s
